Reviews.Title: Corby is WOW
Reviews.Author: King
Reviews.Content: I have been searching for a modern, easy to use non-smart phone and this is it!! It has all the technology that one needs making the internet and social media available but not the primary use of the phone.  This is an excellent phone for making calls and texting.  It has a variety of ring tones and wallpapers and font sizes that can actually be seen!  And also of note - it displays the clock in an easy to ready at a glance format.  Love it and loved the service I got from seller... ordered Sat PM - on my doorstep by noon Mon with only standard shipping!

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung B3210 Corby TXT Phone - Unlocked Black
